agents.name: ImageryEnhancer
agents.description: Detects abstract or conceptual passages and enriches them with concrete sensory descriptions—sight, sound, texture, motion—for vividness.

agents.name: ConceptReframer
agents.description: Reconstructs the central ideas of the text through different philosophical, cultural, or ideological lenses (e.g., Marxist, Stoic, Systems Thinking, Nietzschean).

agents.name: PersonaImprinter
agents.description: Applies the voice, worldview, and speaking style of a specific character, historical figure, or archetype (e.g., a war general, Zen monk, tech futurist).

agents.name: MarkdownLogger
agents.description: Logs the initial input and all agent outputs to a Markdown file.
